svcs006 Garbage Can
Rarity: Super Rare
Looking for Inventory Management? Please Login w/ "Remember Me?" option selected.
Garbage Can
This object can't be added to your force (only generated). // When a friendly [SVC] #054 Spider-Man would be KO'd, if this object is unheld, instead you may replace that Spider-Man with [SVC] #016 Peter Parker on click #2 adjacent to this object. If you do, KO this object. Light Object.
10 Points

Spider-Man / Garbage Can / Peter Parker

September 21, 2020
Bobcat2022
WIN ruling on this issue: [url]https://win.wizkids.com/bb/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=15849&sid=bdc20352514d7ed72beb938e92870744[/url] Short version: what HFClub said. The #016 Peter Parker that comes from the Sideline to your force due to the Garbage Can's effect cannot, thereafter, re-enter the Sideline by its own Secret Identity effect (which Peter would have to do, to bring in a Spider-Man rather than being KO'd).
September 8, 2020
hfclub
「A figure that has come off the sideline may only go back on sideline by the same effect, like a shifting focus.」 said by a judge. If Spider-Man would be KO, you may KO the Garbage Can instead and let your opponent get 10 point(for the Garbage Can), then replace that Spider-Man with [SVC] #016 Peter Parker on click #2 adjacent to the Garbage Can. If this Peter Parker is KO, your opponent would get 60 points by the replacement rules.

PillageandPlunder
This object has the potential to give #054 Spider-Man a lot of playability. 6 clix, Peter Parker comes out with 3 clix, and then when goes down a Spider-Man comes out with 3 more clix. POTENTIALLY 12 clix for 60 points... a lot of things to need to go in your favor but it’s certainly possible.
